name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Explore the vast world of Hyrule in this stunning open-world adventure game.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Saddle up and explore the American frontier in this epic Western-themed adventure game.

name: Super Mario Odyssey
description: Join Mario on a globe-trotting adventure to save Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches.

name: Minecraft
description: Build and explore your own blocky world in this popular sandbox game.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Embark on an epic journey as Geralt of Rivia, a professional monster hunter, in this open-world RPG.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: Uncover the mysteries of a post-apocalyptic world overrun by robotic creatures in this action-packed adventure game.

name: Fortnite
description: Fight for survival in a battle royale-style game that has taken the world by storm.

name: Overwatch
description: Join a team of heroes and compete in fast-paced, team-based battles in this popular first-person shooter game.

name: Fallout 4
description: Explore a post-apocalyptic wasteland and build your own settlements in this open-world RPG.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Experience the seedy underbelly of Los Santos in this open-world crime game.
